header.title: AI Agent Developer & Workflow Automation Engineer

sections.content: Designing, implementing, and deploying intelligent AI agents to automate complex workflows across research and administrative processes. Building multi-agent coordination systems, integrating LLM-powered reasoning with data retrieval pipelines, and optimizing task orchestration for speed, accuracy, and scalability. Leveraging cutting-edge frameworks to bridge natural language understanding with actionable execution in real-world applications.

Optimize AI systems for speed, accuracy, and scalability
Bridge natural language understanding with actionable execution
Deploy AI solutions in real-world research and administrative environments

header.title: Image Processing in Robotics
header.company: Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics Laboratory, IUT

sections.content: During my first year at Isfahan University of Technology (IUT), I worked in the Advanced Robotics and Mechatronics Laboratory at the Mechanical Engineering Department. My primary focus was on applying image processing techniques to robotic systems, contributing to projects that required real-time object detection and feature extraction for robotic automation.

items: Develop image processing algorithms for robotic vision systems
Implement real-time object detection and tracking
Design feature extraction methods for robotic automation
Optimize computer vision algorithms for real-time performance
Collaborate on research projects in robotics and mechatronics
